trans-unit.id:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.source:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.target:
**%@ Lisensproblem oppdaget**
Denne installasjonen har blitt deaktivert eksternt, eller maskinvarens identifikatorer har endret seg siden siste lisensaktivering. Dette kan ha skjedd på grunn av en maskinvareoppgradering eller migrering til en ny enhet.
Vennligst reaktiver denne installasjonen for å fortsette å bruke Pro-funksjonene.

trans-unit.id:
**%@ Outdated License**
The provided license was originally issued for an earlier version of %@ and has already been extended once with a complimentary upgrade to a subsequent major version.
This license no longer covers the current app version (v%@). To use this version of %@, please purchase a new license.
Thank you for your understanding and continued support.
trans-unit.source:
**%1$@ Outdated License**
The provided license was originally issued for an earlier version of %2$@ and has already been extended once with a complimentary upgrade to a subsequent major version.
This license no longer covers the current app version (v%3$@). To use this version of %4$@, please purchase a new license.
Thank you for your understanding and continued support.

trans-unit.target: En kontrollerbar skjerm er til stede

trans-unit.id: A display group can cover all displays (with an optionally specified list of exceptions) or may consist of a specific list of displays. Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.
trans-unit.source: A display group can cover all displays (with an optionally specified list of exceptions) or may consist of a specific list of displays. Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.
trans-unit.target: En visningsgruppe kan dekke alle skjermer (med en valgfri liste over unntak) eller bestå av en spesifikk liste over skjermer. Medlemskap i en visningsgruppe kan avgjøre aktiveringsstatus for gruppen (avhengig av policy-innstillingene for aktivering) og påvirke hvordan funksjoner basert på visningsgrupper oppfører seg.

trans-unit.id: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.source: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.

trans-unit.id: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.source: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: En popup-varsling vises når appen oppdager interferens fra andre apper som justerer fargetabellen. Nyttig for feilsøking.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skjerm ligner en ekte skjerm, men eksisterer kun i det virtuelle rommet (i datamaskinens minne). Du kan vise den i et PIP-vindu, strømme eller speile innholdet til en ekte skjerm, eller bruke den som kilde for skjermopptak eller skjermdeling via en passende app.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skjerm som er knyttet til en skjerm, kobles automatisk til eller fra når den tilknyttede skjermen kobles til eller fra. Du kan deaktivere automatisk tilkobling for tilknyttede virtuelle skjermer.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skjerm som er knyttet til en skjerm, kobles automatisk til når den tilknyttede skjermen kobles til. Alle andre virtuelle skjermer ble tilkoblet. Du kan deaktivere automatisk tilkobling for tilknyttede virtuelle skjermer.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: En virtuell skjerm som er knyttet til en skjerm, kobles automatisk fra når den tilknyttede skjermen kobles fra. Alle andre virtuelle skjermer ble koblet fra. Du kan deaktivere automatisk frakobling for tilknyttede virtuelle skjermer.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect or disconnect automatically when the associated display is connected or disconnected.

trans-unit.source: Combined brightness is not required with default settings as the native XDR brightness scale covers the entire configurable scale. Use only if you want to fine-tune the dimming curve below the configured XDR brightness scale minimum

trans-unit.source: Defines how many logical steps the entire range is divided into. By default, it matches the number of fine steps available in the native macOS OSD (64).

trans-unit.source: Defines the TCP port the built-in HTTP server listens to.

trans-unit.id: Defines the diagonal size the system perceives the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.
trans-unit.source: Defines the diagonal size the system perceives the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.

trans-unit.id: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.source: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.target: Definerer nedre grense for lysstyrkekontroll i nits. Bruk 0 for full kontinuerlig demping til svart.

trans-unit.id: Defines the number of logical steps in a fine adjustment step. By default, this equals one-quarter of a chiclet in the native macOS OSD (1 logical step).
trans-unit.source: Defines the number of logical steps in a fine adjustment step. By default, this equals one-quarter of a chiclet in the native macOS OSD (1 logical step).
trans-unit.target: Definerer antall trinn i et finjusteringstrinn. Som standard tilsvarer dette en kvart chiclet i macOS-OSD (1 trinn).

trans-unit.id: Defines the number of logical steps in a standard adjustment step. By default, this equals one full chiclet of the native macOS OSD (4 steps per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steps = 64 total steps).
trans-unit.source: Defines the number of logical steps in a standard adjustment step. By default, this equals one full chiclet of the native macOS OSD (4 steps per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steps = 64 total steps).
trans-unit.target: Definerer antall trinn i et standardjusteringstrinn. Som standard tilsvarer dette én full chiclet i macOS-OSD (4 trinn × 16 chiclets = 64 trinn).

trans-unit.id: Defines the upper bound of brightness control in nits. Use 1000 for only allowing up to sustained full screen brightness.
trans-unit.source: Defines the upper bound of brightness control in nits. Use 1000 for only allowing up to sustained full screen brightness.
trans-unit.target: Definerer øvre grense for lysstyrkekontroll i nits. Bruk 1000 for å kun tillate vedvarende fullskjermslysstyrke.

trans-unit.source: If this display group is active, no other display groups with lower priority can be active. If any other display group with higher priority is active, this display group cannot be active.

trans-unit.id:
If your display is not fully compatible with this feature, the app may not be able to turn the backlight off or turn it back on again!

trans-unit.source:
If your display is not fully compatible with this feature, the app may not be able to turn the backlight off or turn it back on again!
Not all displays support DDC power operations. DDC power operations can cause (even serious) issues with some displays!

Hvis skjermen din ikke støtter denne funksjonen fullt ut, kan ikke appen slå av baklyset eller slå det på igjen!
Ikke alle skjermer støtter DDC-strømoperasjoner. Slike operasjoner kan forårsake (også alvorlige) problemer med noen skjermer!

trans-unit.source: In a detached state the app menu floats over the desktop as a top-level window. You can specify the alpha level to see-through the menu (lower the value for more transparency).

trans-unit.id: Increase display brightness beyond 100%. Requires an Apple XDR display or a HDR capable external display in HDR mode. The feature works with color table adjustments enabled on Apple Silicon Macs or with it disabled (using Metal based overlay brightness control) on all platforms. Upscaling using Metal may increase CPU and GPU usage on some systems.
trans-unit.source: Increase display brightness beyond 100%. Requires an Apple XDR display or a HDR capable external display in HDR mode. The feature works with color table adjustments enabled on Apple Silicon Macs or with it disabled (using Metal based overlay brightness control) on all platforms. Upscaling using Metal may increase CPU and GPU usage on some systems.
trans-unit.target: Øk skjermens lysstyrke utover 100 %. Krever en Apple XDR-skjerm eller en HDR-kompatibel ekstern skjerm i HDR-modus. Funksjonen fungerer med fargekartjusteringer aktivert på Apple Silicon eller deaktivert (ved bruk av Metal-basert overleggstyring) på alle plattformer. Oppskalering med Metal kan øke CPU- og GPU-bruk på enkelte systemer.

trans-unit.id: It is advised to leave this on, especially if the custom EDID alters display identity. Without this the app may detect the display as different upon next startup.
trans-unit.source: It is advised to leave this on, especially if the custom EDID alters display identity. Without this the app may detect the display as different upon next startup.

trans-unit.id: It is best to let the app configure relevant features (contrast, color controls) to have the current value set as default. If the currently displayed image is not optimal, use the display's OSD to fix things first and then run detection again before proceeding!
trans-unit.source: It is best to let the app configure relevant features (contrast, color controls) to have the current value set as default. If the currently displayed image is not optimal, use the display's OSD to fix things first and then run detection again before proceeding!
trans-unit.target: Det er best å la appen konfigurere relevante funksjoner (kontrast, fargekontroller) slik at gjeldende verdi blir standard. Hvis det viste bildet ikke er optimalt, bruk skjermens OSD for å justere først, kjør deretter deteksjon på nytt før du fortsetter!

trans-unit.id: Keep Sidecar displays in display list after being disconnected
trans-unit.source: Keep Sidecar displays in display list after being disconnected
trans-unit.target: Vis Sidecar-skjermer i skjermlisten etter frakobling

trans-unit.id: Layout protection enforces a configured arrangement for group member displays relative to each other. The feature can be used to make sure the displays are arranged properly after changing display resolutions, connecting new displays that are not part of the display group or dealing with displays that are not properly handled by the built-in display layout management of the operating system.
trans-unit.source: Layout protection enforces a configured arrangement for group member displays relative to each other. The feature can be used to make sure the displays are arranged properly after changing display resolutions, connecting new displays that are not part of the display group or dealing with displays that are not properly handled by the built-in display layout management of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Layoutbeskyttelse håndhever en konfigurert plassering av gruppemedlemsskjermer i forhold til hverandre. Funksjonen kan brukes for å sikre at skjermene er riktig plassert etter endring av oppløsning, tilkobling av nye skjermer som ikke er en del av skjermgruppen, eller ved problemer med operativsystemets innebygde skjermoppsett.

trans-unit.id: Leave mute key under OS control
trans-unit.source: Leave mute key under OS control

trans-unit.id: Let UI size be matched among members of the display group when the resolution of a watched group member display changes. This feature works best on displays with flexible scaling enabled.
trans-unit.source: Let UI size be matched among members of the display group when the resolution of a watched group member display changes. This feature works best on displays with flexible scaling enabled.

trans-unit.source: Some Apple displays use Presets to manage display color reproduction, gamma, white point settings. Color Profiles can still be used to influence rendering to a limited extent however Presets work best when the factory default Color Profile is configured for the Apple display.

Fargeprofiler kan fortsatt påvirke gjengivelse i begrenset grad, men forhåndsinnstillinger fungerer best når fabrikkens standard fargeprofil er konfigurert for skjermen.

trans-unit.id: The DDC reset command might not work properly for all displays. You can also try using the built-in factory reset functionality of the display (usually accessible via the display OSD).
trans-unit.source: The DDC reset command might not work properly for all displays. You can also try using the built-in factory reset functionality of the display (usually accessible via the display OSD).
trans-unit.target: DDC-tilbakestillingskommandoen fungerer kanskje ikke riktig for alle skjermer. Du kan også prøve å bruke innebygd fabrikktilbakestilling i skjermen (vanligvis tilgjengelig via skjermens OSD).

trans-unit.id: The OSD appears on the affected display instead of the display with the active menu bar (similar to older macOS versions).
trans-unit.source: The OSD appears on the affected display instead of the display with the active menu bar (similar to older macOS versions).

trans-unit.id: The app automatically attempts to reconnect all displays when no connected display is present.
trans-unit.source: The app automatically attempts to reconnect all displays when no connected display is present.
trans-unit.target: Appen forsøker automatisk å koble til alle skjermer på nytt når ingen tilkoblede skjermer er til stede.

trans-unit.id: The app can automatically connect and disconnect a virtual screen based on the availability of the display(s) it is associated with. It can also auto-start mirroring or streaming or follow the associated display's orientation.
trans-unit.source: The app can automatically connect and disconnect a virtual screen based on the availability of the display(s) it is associated with. It can also auto-start mirroring or streaming or follow the associated display's orientation.
trans-unit.target: Appen kan automatisk koble til og fra en virtuell skjerm basert på tilgjengeligheten til skjermen(e) den er tilknyttet. Den kan også starte speiling eller strømming automatisk eller følge den tilknyttede skjermens orientering.

trans-unit.id: The app menu icon will reflect the icon of the current main display. Enable if you don't like the default icon…
trans-unit.source: The app menu icon will reflect the icon of the current main display. Enable if you don't like the default icon…
trans-unit.target: Appmenyikonet vil gjenspeile ikonet til den nåværende hovedskjermen. Aktiver hvis du ikke liker standardikonet…

trans-unit.id: The app menu will show this name instead of the system name for the display. If you want to change the system-wide name, you can do so by enabling the configuration override option and editing the system display name.
trans-unit.source: The app menu will show this name instead of the system name for the display. If you want to change the system-wide name, you can do so by enabling the configuration override option and editing the system display name.
trans-unit.target: Appmenyen vil vise dette navnet i stedet for systemnavnet for skjermen. Hvis du vil endre systemomfattende navn, kan du gjøre det ved å aktivere konfigurasjonsoverskrivingsalternativet og redigere systemets skjermnavn.

trans-unit.id: The app normally does not restore full dimming upon wake or app startup to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.source: The app normally does not restore full dimming upon wake or app startup to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.target: Appen gjenoppretter normalt ikke full demping ved oppvåkning eller oppstart for å unngå forvirring.

trans-unit.id: The app was launched using Rosetta. Some features won't work.
trans-unit.source: The app was launched using Rosetta. Some features won't work.
trans-unit.target: Appen ble startet med Rosetta. Noen funksjoner vil ikke fungere.

trans-unit.id: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold ⇧ Shift on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.
trans-unit.source: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold ⇧ Shift on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.
trans-unit.target: Appen vil bruke den innleste EDID-en når denne skjermen kobles til. Operasjonen får skjermen til å blinke og bytte modus hvis gjeldende modus ikke er tilgjengelig med oppdatert EDID. Hvis den nye EDID-en har ulike ID-data (leverandør, modell, serienummer), vil skjermen bli gjenoppdaget som en annen. Hold nede ⇧ Shift ved oppstart for å aktivere sikker modus og unngå automatisk bruk. Koble til skjermen fysisk igjen for å gå tilbake til originalen ved alvorlige problemer.

trans-unit.id:
The app will forget all stored DDC values and treat all controls as untouched. Sliders will revert to default neutral values.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.source:
The app will forget all stored DDC values and treat all controls as untouched. Sliders will revert to default neutral values.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.target:
Appen vil glemme alle lagrede DDC-verdier og behandle alle kontroller som uberørt. Glidebryterne vil gå tilbake til standard nøytrale verdier.
Denne operasjonen tilbakestiller ikke selve skjermen.

trans-unit.id:
The app will reset all DDC feature settings to its defaults.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.source:
The app will reset all DDC feature settings to its defaults.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.target:
Appen vil tilbakestille alle DDC-funksjonsinnstillinger til standardverdier.
Denne operasjonen tilbakestiller ikke selve skjermen.

trans-unit.id: The built-in display is configured to be disconnected when an external display is connected. This setting will be re-enabled when the built-in display is manually disconnected again or the app is restarted.
trans-unit.source: The built-in display is configured to be disconnected when an external display is connected. This setting will be re-enabled when the built-in display is manually disconnected again or the app is restarted.
trans-unit.target: Den innebygde skjermen er konfigurert til å kobles fra når en ekstern skjerm tilkobles. Denne innstillingen vil bli aktivert igjen når den innebygde skjermen kobles fra manuelt på nytt, eller når appen startes på nytt.

trans-unit.id: The built-in display of the iMac cannot be easily reconnected (lack of display cable, closable lid) in case of an application failure. Enable this setting with extra caution!
trans-unit.source: The built-in display of the iMac cannot be easily reconnected (lack of display cable, closable lid) in case of an application failure. Enable this setting with extra caution!
trans-unit.target: Den innebygde skjermen på iMac kan ikke enkelt kobles til igjen (manglende skjermkabel, lukkbart lokk) ved programfeil. Aktiver denne innstillingen med ekstra forsiktighet!

trans-unit.id: The default input source list reflects commonly occurring assignments, but the actual list varies by display vendor/model. Try using the "LG alt" toggle for some newer LG displays if input control does not work!
trans-unit.source: The default input source list reflects commonly occurring assignments, but the actual list varies by display vendor/model. Try using the "LG alt" toggle for some newer LG displays if input control does not work!
trans-unit.target: Den forhåndsdefinerte listen over inndatakilder gjenspeiler vanlige tildelinger, men den faktiske listen varierer etter skjermleverandør/-modell. Prøv å bruke «LG alt»-bryteren for noen nyere LG-skjermer hvis inndatakontroll ikke fungerer!

trans-unit.id: The display group is marked as exclusive while at least one other display group with higher priority is active.
trans-unit.source: The display group is marked as exclusive while at least one other display group with higher priority is active.
trans-unit.target: Skjermgruppen er merket som eksklusiv mens minst én annen skjermgruppe med høyere prioritet er aktiv.

trans-unit.id: The display group will be activated or deactivated depending on the activation settings, configured group members and various other factors.
trans-unit.source: The display group will be activated or deactivated depending on the activation settings, configured group members and various other factors.
trans-unit.target: Skjermgruppen vil bli aktivert eller deaktivert avhengig av aktiveringsinnstillinger, konfigurerte gruppemedlemmer og ulike andre faktorer.

trans-unit.id: The display group will not activate when other displays are connected beyond group members.
trans-unit.source: The display group will not activate when other displays are connected beyond group members.
trans-unit.target: Skjermgruppen vil ikke aktiveres når andre skjermer utenfor gruppemedlemmer er tilkoblet.

trans-unit.id: The display may not be properly configured for DDC hardware brightness control and other similar features. Use detection and auto-configuration or adjust DDC settings manually.
trans-unit.source: The display may not be properly configured for DDC hardware brightness control and other similar features. Use detection and auto-configuration or adjust DDC settings manually.
trans-unit.target: Skjermen er kanskje ikke riktig konfigurert for DDC-maskinvarekontroll av lysstyrke og andre lignende funksjoner. Bruk deteksjon og automatisk konfigurasjon, eller juster DDC-innstillinger manuelt.

trans-unit.id: The display might have limited DDC support
trans-unit.source: The display might have limited DDC support

trans-unit.id: The display or connection does not support DDC
trans-unit.source: The display or connection does not support DDC
trans-unit.target: Skjermen eller tilkoblingen støtter ikke DDC

trans-unit.id: The display will be automatically disconnected upon detection or physical connect if it was disconnected using the app beforehand. This setting might cause unexpected issues (connect-disconnect cycle with incompatible displays, lack of any connected displays) - use with caution!
trans-unit.source: The display will be automatically disconnected upon detection or physical connect if it was disconnected using the app beforehand. This setting might cause unexpected issues (connect-disconnect cycle with incompatible displays, lack of any connected displays) - use with caution!
trans-unit.target: Skjermen vil bli automatisk koblet fra ved påvisning eller fysisk tilkobling hvis den ble koblet fra med appen på forhånd. Denne innstillingen kan forårsake uventede problemer (tilkoble-frakoble-syklus med inkompatible skjermer, ingen tilkoblede skjermer) – bruk med forsiktighet!

trans-unit.id: The duplicated group will be disabled by default.
trans-unit.source: The duplicated group will be disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Den dupliserte gruppen vil være deaktivert som standard.

trans-unit.id: The menu bar icon is aligned to the center relative to the app menu. Disable this for a more traditional look (align the menu bar icon to the left side of the app menu).
trans-unit.source: The menu bar icon is aligned to the center relative to the app menu. Disable this for a more traditional look (align the menu bar icon to the left side of the app menu).

trans-unit.id: The nits counter will offer clear (and slightly exaggerated) visual feedback during upscaling.
trans-unit.source: The nits counter will offer clear (and slightly exaggerated) visual feedback during upscaling.
trans-unit.target: Nitstelleren vil gi tydelig (og litt overdrevent) visuell tilbakemelding under oppskalering.

trans-unit.id:
The operation completed successfully.
A new display group with the name '%@' was created. The display group is currently not enabled.
Enable and configure the created display group (including layout protection) under Settings > Groups!
trans-unit.source:
The operation completed successfully.
A new display group with the name '%@' was created. The display group is currently not enabled.
Enable and configure the created display group (including layout protection) under Settings > Groups!

Operasjonen ble fullført uten feil.
En ny skjermgruppe med navnet «%@» ble opprettet. Skjermgruppen er for øyeblikket ikke aktivert.
Aktiver og konfigurer den opprettede skjermgruppen (inkludert layoutbeskyttelse) under Innstillinger > Grupper!

trans-unit.id: The operation could not be performed.
trans-unit.source: The operation could not be performed.

trans-unit.id:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the factory EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the current EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.source:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the factory EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the current EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.target:
Operasjonen kan få skjermen til å blinke og bytte modus hvis gjeldende modus ikke er tilgjengelig med fabrikkens EDID. Skjermen vil bli gjenoppdaget som en annen enhet hvis gjeldende EDID har ulike identifikatorer.
Ved feil, koble fra og til skjermen fysisk igjen.

trans-unit.id:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.source:
The operation might cause the screen to flicker and switch mode if the existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. The display will be redetected as a different display if the EDID has different identifiers.
In case of a failure, disconnect and reconnect the display physically.
trans-unit.target:
Operasjonen kan få skjermen til å blinke og bytte modus hvis gjeldende modus ikke er tilgjengelig med oppdatert EDID. Skjermen vil bli gjenoppdaget som en annen enhet hvis EDID har ulike identifikatorer.
Ved feil, koble fra og til skjermen fysisk igjen.

trans-unit.id: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the 'display physical dimensions' setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.source: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the 'display physical dimensions' setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.target: Den fysiske dimensjonen (som brukes til å beregne UI-skaleringsfaktor) knyttet til en virtuell skjerm bestemmes først og fremst av innstillingen «rapportert diagonal størrelse», som kan endres ytterligere via innstillingen «skjermens fysiske dimensjoner» når den virtuelle skjermen er tilkoblet.

trans-unit.id: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the `display physical dimensions` setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.source: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the `display physical dimensions` setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.target: Den fysiske dimensjonen (som brukes til å beregne UI-skaleringsfaktor) knyttet til en virtuell skjerm bestemmes først og fremst av innstillingen «rapportert diagonal størrelse», som kan endres ytterligere via innstillingen `skjermens fysiske dimensjoner` når den virtuelle skjermen er tilkoblet.

trans-unit.id: The slider will omit resolutions that do not match the display's size in order to reduce clutter and make slider easier to use. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.source: The slider will omit resolutions that do not match the display's size in order to reduce clutter and make slider easier to use. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.target: Glidebryteren vil utelate oppløsninger som ikke samsvarer med skjermens størrelse for å redusere rot og gjøre glidebryteren lettere å bruke. Påvirker også hurtigtaster for oppløsning.

trans-unit.id: The system might reconnect the built-in display and other displays after wake from sleep to ensure GUI access. With this option enabled, the app forcefully disconnects these displays again. Post-wake main display will not be disconnected.
trans-unit.source: The system might reconnect the built-in display and other displays after wake from sleep to ensure GUI access. With this option enabled, the app forcefully disconnects these displays again. Post-wake main display will not be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Systemet kan koble til den innebygde skjermen og andre skjermer igjen etter oppvåkning fra hvilemodus for å sikre GUI-tilgang. Med dette alternativet aktivert, tvinger appen disse skjermene til å koble fra igjen. Hovedskjermen etter oppvåkning vil ikke bli koblet fra.

trans-unit.id: The time it takes for the app to enter into an active state after the system wakes from a sleep.
trans-unit.source: The time it takes for the app to enter into an active state after the system wakes from a sleep.
trans-unit.target: Tiden det tar for appen å komme i aktiv tilstand etter at systemet våkner fra hvilemodus.

trans-unit.id: The time it takes for the app to respond to a configuration change.
trans-unit.source: The time it takes for the app to respond to a configuration change.
trans-unit.target: Tiden det tar for appen å svare på en konfigurasjonsendring.

trans-unit.id: The virtual screen created with this aspect ratio does not seem to be viable.
trans-unit.source: The virtual screen created with this aspect ratio does not seem to be viable.
trans-unit.target: Den virtuelle skjermen opprettet med dette aspektforholdet ser ikke ut til å være levedyktig.

trans-unit.id: The virtual screen is now associated with a display and to comply with association settings, the virtual screen should automatically change its connection status. Alternatively you can disable auto-connect (it can be enabled any time under association settings).
trans-unit.source: The virtual screen is now associated with a display and to comply with association settings, the virtual screen should automatically change its connection status. Alternatively you can disable auto-connect (it can be enabled any time under association settings).
trans-unit.target: Den virtuelle skjermen er nå tilknyttet en skjerm, og for å overholde tilknytningsinnstillinger bør den virtuelle skjermen automatisk endre tilkoblingsstatus. Alternativt kan du deaktivere automatisk tilkobling (den kan aktiveres når som helst under tilknytningsinnstillinger).

trans-unit.id: The virtual screen was not created.
trans-unit.source: The virtual screen was not created.
trans-unit.target: Den virtuelle skjermen ble ikke opprettet.

trans-unit.id: The ⇧ Shift key was pressed during launch. The app started in safe mode.
trans-unit.source: The ⇧ Shift key was pressed during launch. The app started in safe mode.
trans-unit.target: ⇧ Shift-tasten ble trykket under oppstart. Appen startet i sikker modus.

trans-unit.id: There are not at least two display group members present.
trans-unit.source: There are not at least two display group members present.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke minst to gruppemedlemskjermer til stede.

trans-unit.id: There are some unapplied system configuration changes.
trans-unit.source: There are some unapplied system configuration changes.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes noen ikke anvendte systemkonfigurasjonsendringer.

trans-unit.id: There is at least one controllable display connected
trans-unit.source: There is at least one controllable display connected
trans-unit.target: Det er minst én kontrollerbar skjerm tilkoblet

trans-unit.id: There is no at least one display group member present.
trans-unit.source: There is no at least one display group member present.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke minst ett skjermgruppe-medlem til stede.

trans-unit.id: There is no group member present.
trans-unit.source: There is no group member present.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen gruppemedlemmer til stede.

trans-unit.id: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serve as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.source: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serve as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.target: Disse tre identifikatorene (serienummer, leverandør og modell-ID) utgjør grunnlaget for skjermidentifikasjon i macOS. Hvis noen av disse endres, vil systemet tildele den virtuelle skjermen en ny identitet (UUID) og behandle den som nytilkoblet.

trans-unit.id: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.source: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir ekstra alternativer for bildejustering når fargetabelljusteringer ikke er aktivert eller tilgjengelige. Medfører en liten ytelsesstraff. Denne funksjonen er alltid aktiv når programvarebasert lysstyrkeoppskalering er slått på mens fargetabelljusteringer ikke er tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.id: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.source: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.target: Dette muliggjør avansert demping, fargejusteringer og andre funksjoner som programvarebasert XDR/HDR-oppskalering. Merk: fargejusteringer klipper HDR-innhold ved aktiv bruk. Hvis dette alternativet er deaktivert, vil appen bruke demping via overlegg og Metal for programvarebasert XDR/HDR-oppskalering.

trans-unit.id: This allows the dimming or image adjustment overlay to take effect on the lock screen and on spaces where it is normally ineffective.
trans-unit.source: This allows the dimming or image adjustment overlay to take effect on the lock screen and on spaces where it is normally ineffective.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at dimming eller bildejusteringsoverlegg også gjelder på låseskjermen.

trans-unit.id: This applies both to physically connecting an external display and using the app to reconnect one. However, the app will not reconnect the built-in display if you allow all displays to be disconnected!
trans-unit.source: This applies both to physically connecting an external display and using the app to reconnect one. However, the app will not reconnect the built-in display if you allow all displays to be disconnected!
trans-unit.target: Dette gjelder både fysisk tilkobling av en ekstern skjerm og bruk av appen for å koble til igjen. Appen vil imidlertid ikke koble til den innebygde skjermen hvis du tillater at alle skjermer kobles fra!

trans-unit.id: This can be a result of disabled DDC/CI support (check the display's OSD), display firmware limitations or connection issues. Many TVs and TV-derived smart monitors do not support DDC. If the issue cannot be resolved either by changing display settings or fixing cable issues, you should disable DDC support.
trans-unit.source: This can be a result of disabled DDC/CI support (check the display's OSD), display firmware limitations or connection issues. Many TVs and TV-derived smart monitors do not support DDC. If the issue cannot be resolved either by changing display settings or fixing cable issues, you should disable DDC support.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skyldes deaktivert DDC/CI-støtte (sjekk skjermens OSD), fastvarebegrensninger eller tilkoblingsproblemer. Mange TV-er og TV-baserte smartmonitorer støtter ikke DDC. Hvis problemet ikke løses ved å endre skjerminnstillinger eller fikse kabelfeil, bør du deaktivere DDC-støtte.

trans-unit.id: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With port and location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.source: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With port and location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.target: Dette konfigurerer hvordan data knyttet til den nåværende konfigurerte skjermen matches med en oppdaget skjerm under konfigurasjons-/påvisningsprosessen. Endring av denne innstillingen kan føre til at en skjerm blir gjenkjent som tidligere ikke tilkoblet og at eksisterende lagrede skjermkonfigurasjoner frakobles. System-UUID-matching bruker macOS-standardidentifikasjon. Når den er satt til å bruke grunnleggende identifikatorer, identifiserer appen skjermen etter leverandør-/modell-ID og serienummer. Med utvidet bruker den også produktnavn, alfanumerisk serienummer og produksjonsdato. Med port og plassering vurderer appen også maskinvaretilkoblingsdata.

trans-unit.id: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.source: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Når HDR-oppskalering er aktivert mens maskinvarebasert lysstyrkekontroll er deaktivert, bruker appen en kontinuerlig lysstyrkeskala fra null til kalibrert maksimal oppskalering. På grunn av dette faller kanskje ikke nøytralinnstillingen (100 % lysstyrke, når HDR-innhold på skjermen ikke er beskåret) på en OSD-grense, noe som gjør den vanskelig å oppnå med snarveistastene. For å fikse dette settes det inn et ekstra mellomsteg ved 100 % lysstyrke.

trans-unit.id: When a watched display's resolution changes, the resolution of all suitable group members are updated as a consequence to match the UI scaling of the watched display.
trans-unit.source: When a watched display's resolution changes, the resolution of all suitable group members are updated as a consequence to match the UI scaling of the watched display.
trans-unit.target: Når oppløsningen på en overvåket skjerm endres, oppdateres oppløsningen til alle passende gruppemedlemmer for å matche UI-skaleringsnivået til den overvåkede skjermen.

trans-unit.id: When enabled, %@ uses a custom, app-drawn OSD instead of the native system OSD.
trans-unit.source: When enabled, %@ uses a custom, app-drawn OSD instead of the native system OSD.

trans-unit.id: When enabled, this display will not trigger the disconnection of the built-in display when it is set to disconnect upon the connection of an external display.
trans-unit.source: When enabled, this display will not trigger the disconnection of the built-in display when it is set to disconnect upon the connection of an external display.
trans-unit.target: Når aktivert, vil ikke denne skjermen utløse frakobling av den innebygde skjermen når den er satt til å kobles fra ved tilkobling av en ekstern skjerm.

trans-unit.id: When expanding a menu item, automatically hide other items under the given device / menu block. This helps keep the menu smaller.
trans-unit.source: When expanding a menu item, automatically hide other items under the given device / menu block. This helps keep the menu smaller.
trans-unit.target: Når et menyelement utvides, skjul automatisk andre elementer under den aktuelle enhets-/menyblokken. Dette hjelper med å holde menyen mindre.

trans-unit.id: When the app detects that the active audio device supports native volume control in macOS while it listens to media keys, it forwards the appropriate operations to the operating system.
trans-unit.source: When the app detects that the active audio device supports native volume control in macOS while it listens to media keys, it forwards the appropriate operations to the operating system.

trans-unit.id: When the display is set as main, the lower limit is 30% for combined or software brightness, 10% for Apple hardware brightness, 0% for DDC hardware brightness.
trans-unit.source: When the display is set as main, the lower limit is 30% for combined or software brightness, 10% for Apple hardware brightness, 0% for DDC hardware brightness.
trans-unit.target: Når skjermen er satt som hovedskjerm, er nedre grense 30 % for kombinert eller programvarelys, 10 % for Apple-maskinvarelys og 0 % for DDC-maskinvarelys.

trans-unit.id: When this is enabled, syncing won't affect displays in HDR mode or XDR displays set to a reference Apple Display Preset.
trans-unit.source: When this is enabled, syncing won't affect displays in HDR mode or XDR displays set to a reference Apple Display Preset.
trans-unit.target: Når dette er aktivert, påvirker ikke synkronisering skjermer i HDR-modus eller XDR-skjermer satt til en referanse i Apple Display Preset.

trans-unit.id: When this is enabled, the app will use hardware brightness for combined brightness control instead of the SDR peak brightness adjustment control (HDR brightness control) provided by macOS. You can still adjust the SDR peak brightness in Control Center - these adjustments will influence the upscaling (if available) headroom provided by the app. Not all displays support hardware brightness control in HDR mode.
trans-unit.source: When this is enabled, the app will use hardware brightness for combined brightness control instead of the SDR peak brightness adjustment control (HDR brightness control) provided by macOS. You can still adjust the SDR peak brightness in Control Center - these adjustments will influence the upscaling (if available) headroom provided by the app. Not all displays support hardware brightness control in HDR mode.
trans-unit.target: Når dette er aktivert, bruker appen maskinvarelys for kombinert lysstyrkekontroll i stedet for SDR-peak-lysjusteringen (HDR-lys) som macOS tilbyr. Du kan fortsatt justere SDR-peak-lys i Kontrollsenteret – disse justeringene påvirker oppskaleringen (hvis tilgjengelig) som appen gir. Ikke alle skjermer støtter maskinvarelys i HDR-modus.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled Sidecar displays disconnected using the app will remain in the display list for easy reconnect. Sidecar displays disconnected outside of the app or before app startup are not listed.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled Sidecar displays disconnected using the app will remain in the display list for easy reconnect. Sidecar displays disconnected outside of the app or before app startup are not listed.
trans-unit.target: Med dette aktivert forblir Sidecar-skjermer koblet fra via appen i skjermlisten for enkel gjenkobling. Sidecar-skjermer koblet fra utenfor appen eller før appen startet blir ikke listet.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled scale matching will affect displays that have resolution configuration protection enabled. The protected resolution will be updated as well.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled scale matching will affect displays that have resolution configuration protection enabled. The protected resolution will be updated as well.
trans-unit.target: Med dette aktivert påvirker skalamatching skjermer med oppløsningsbeskyttelse aktivert. Den beskyttede oppløsningen oppdateres også.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled the app will perform the scale matching operation when the resolution of a watched display was changed by the system or by some other app. If the resolution of multiple watched displays are changed (for example, because of a layout change), no action is taken to avoid ambiguity.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled the app will perform the scale matching operation when the resolution of a watched display was changed by the system or by some other app. If the resolution of multiple watched displays are changed (for example, because of a layout change), no action is taken to avoid ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: Med dette aktivert utfører appen skalamatching når oppløsningen på en overvåket skjerm endres av systemet eller en annen app. Hvis flere overvåkede skjermer endres samtidig (f.eks. ved endret oppsett), gjøres ingen endring for å unngå uklarhet.

trans-unit.id: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. In this case however various settings (like "Make fine scale default" or control "All suitable screens" simultaneously) that modify the default behavior of the brightness keys will not apply.
trans-unit.source: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. In this case however various settings (like "Make fine scale default" or control "All suitable screens" simultaneously) that modify the default behavior of the brightness keys will not apply.
trans-unit.target: Med dette valget lar appen de native lysstyrketastene styres av macOS hvis kun Apple-skjermer er tilkoblet uten ekstra programvarekontroll. I så fall vil innstillinger som “Gjør fin skala standard” eller “Alle passende skjermer” ikke gjelde for lysstyrketastene.

trans-unit.id:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.source:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.target:
⚠️ En EDID-skriveoperasjon endrer EDID- og DisplayID-data på selve enheten. Feil EDID-data eller en feil under EDID-skriving kan gjøre skjermen permanent ubrukelig!
De fleste skjermer tillater ikke EDID-skriving av sikkerhetsgrunner; noen skjermer krever at EDID-skriving aktiveres i en servicemeny. De fleste EDID-emulatorer eller pass-thru-dongler støtter EDID-skriving. EDID-skriving (hvis støttet) fungerer vanligvis over HDMI.

trans-unit.target: ⚠️ En alternativ EDID-identitet er aktiv – systemkonfigurasjonsendringer vil knyttes til denne identiteten!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected Apple Display Preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected Apple Display Preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ For denne XDR-skjermen er det best å sette kalibreringen til Standard – Autokalibrer slik at appen automatisk kan tilpasse oppskaleringen til det valgte Apple Display Preset og miljøforhold. For manuell kalibrering, sett lysstyrkeslideren så høyt som mulig samtidig som du sørger for at du fortsatt ser det smilende ansiktet!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Full screen streaming is unavailable as it requires Screen Recording permissions. You can grant this under System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Recording!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Full screen streaming is unavailable as it requires Screen Recording permissions. You can grant this under System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Recording!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Fullskjermstrømming er ikke tilgjengelig da det krever skjermopptaksrettigheter. Du kan gi disse under Systeminnstillinger > Personvern og sikkerhet > Skjermopptak!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If you want to mirror/stream the virtual screen to a natively connected display only to get flexible HiDPI resolutions, it is recommended to use the flexible scaling feature instead if possible! If you want to use mirroring instead of streaming, this can be enabled in the app menu once the virtual screen was connected.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Hvis du vil speile/strømme den virtuelle skjermen til en innfødt tilkoblet skjerm kun for å få fleksible HiDPI-oppløsninger, anbefales det å bruke funksjonen for fleksibel skalering i stedet om mulig!
